title: Add 6 additional classic games to Retro Arcade (frontend)

requirements.summary: Implement six new playable game pages (Centipede, Missile Command, Pinball, Bubble Shooter, Q*bert, Dig Dug) following existing UI/UX patterns and score submission flow.
acceptanceCriteria: There are 6 new routes (one per new game) that render a playable game (not a placeholder screen).
Each new game page displays: Back to Games navigation, a visible score display, a How to Play section, and controls consistent with existing games (Start/Pause/Reset where applicable).
Each new game triggers a game-over (or equivalent end-of-run) state and shows a score submission dialog that calls the existing score submission flow.
User-facing text on the new pages is in English.

file_operations.description: Create a dedicated playable Centipede React/TypeScript game page matching existing game page structure (Back button, main play area, SCORE card, HOW TO PLAY card, Start/Pause/Reset where applicable) and implement end-of-run state that opens a shadcn-ui Dialog for score submission using useSubmitScore(). Use shadcn-ui components (Card/Button/Dialog/Input/Label) to match existing UI. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

Create a dedicated playable Missile Command React/TypeScript game page matching existing game page structure and controls, with a game-over state that opens a shadcn-ui Dialog and submits score via useSubmitScore() using game name 'Missile Command'. Use shadcn-ui components to match existing UI. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

Create a dedicated playable Pinball React/TypeScript game page matching existing game page patterns (Back button, score panel, how-to-play panel, controls as applicable). Implement a run/end condition (e.g., balls/lives exhausted) that shows a shadcn-ui Dialog to submit the final score via useSubmitScore() using game name 'Pinball'. Use shadcn-ui components to match existing UI. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

Create a dedicated playable Bubble Shooter React/TypeScript game page matching existing game page patterns and include Start/Pause/Reset where applicable. Implement end-of-run conditions (e.g., bubbles reach a limit or cleared) that triggers a shadcn-ui Dialog and submits score via useSubmitScore() using game name 'Bubble Shooter'. Use shadcn-ui components to match existing UI. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

Create a dedicated playable Q*bert React/TypeScript game page matching existing UI/UX patterns, with visible scoring and controls, and an end-of-run state that opens a shadcn-ui Dialog to submit score via useSubmitScore() using game name 'Q*bert'. Use shadcn-ui components to match existing UI. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

Create a dedicated playable Dig Dug React/TypeScript game page matching existing UI/UX patterns, with visible scoring and controls, and a game-over/end-of-run state that opens a shadcn-ui Dialog to submit score via useSubmitScore() using game name 'Dig Dug'. Use shadcn-ui components to match existing UI. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

requirements.summary: Wire the six new games into routing and navigation (App routes, Home card mappings, Leaderboard Play button mapping).
acceptanceCriteria: Home page shows 6 additional game cards returned by getAvailableGames(), and the Play Now button navigates to the correct new game route for each new game.
/leaderboard loads tabs from backend getAvailableGames() (existing behavior) and the "Play {game.name}" button navigates correctly for each of the six new games.
All new routes render without runtime errors (no undefined route/image lookups for the new game names).

file_operations.description: Add imports and TanStack Router routes for the 6 new game pages (Centipede, Missile Command, Pinball, Bubble Shooter, Q*bert, Dig Dug) and register them in the routeTree so navigation to each new game path renders without runtime errors.

Extend the Home page navigation mappings to include route slugs and preview image mappings for the six new game names returned by getAvailableGames() (Centipede, Missile Command, Pinball, Bubble Shooter, Q*bert, Dig Dug) so Play Now and card rendering do not hit undefined lookups. Use existing shadcn-ui Card/Button patterns already present. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

Extend the GAME_ROUTES mapping so the "Play {game.name}" button navigates correctly for the six new game names (Centipede, Missile Command, Pinball, Bubble Shooter, Q*bert, Dig Dug) loaded from getAvailableGames(). Use existing shadcn-ui Tabs/Table/Button patterns. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

requirements.summary: Add and render static preview images for the six new games using the existing generated asset convention and Home page mapping.
acceptanceCriteria: Six new preview image files exist under frontend/public/assets/generated with the exact filenames specified in imageRequirements.required.
Home page cards for the six new games render these preview images (no broken image icons).
